title: Measures in place to meet peak power demand in May, June: Govt
description: According to an official statement, the government has implemented sufficient measures to address the projected peak power demand of 235 GW in May and 240 GW in June. The Ministry of Power stated that through various initiatives, they have effectively managed to fulfill the peak evening power demand of 224 GW in April 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
